definitions.definition: ( informal , chiefly UK , Ireland , Commonwealth , dated in the US ) A male person.
( UK , Ireland , Commonwealth , chiefly Cockney , slang ) Someone affable but morally dubious ; a wide boy .
( UK , Ireland , Commonwealth , slang ) Term of address for a male .
( informal , chiefly Canada , US , sometimes mildly derogatory ) An old person, usually a male, typically a cranky old man.
( archaic , UK , Ireland , Commonwealth , slang ) Wife ; old woman .

main_definition: ( informal , chiefly UK , Ireland , Commonwealth , dated in the US ) A male person.

( archaic , UK , Ireland , Commonwealth , slang ) Wife ; old woman .

definitions.definition: Alternative form of geyser ( “ domestic water boiler ” ) .

main_definition: ( South Africa ) Alternative form of geyser ( “ domestic water boiler ” ) .
